Name: Dobrochoczy
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Impaling Branches.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.
In the Tactics Step this model may select an enemy Formation within 18" to watch until the start of the next Tactics Step.

If an enemy Formation under the effect of the Watcher of the Forest ability destroys a SLAVIC PAGANISM model, then roll a D6. On a result of 4+ the Formation being rolled for suffers 1 ethereal damage.
